sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"清楚的，明白的，明显的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: apparent, obvious, evident, clear, plain, distinct, definite, manifest
means: apparent ：强调显而易见或一想便知。这个词从动词appear派生而来，故有时含有表面如此而事实上未必的意味。
obvious ：语气较强，指极为明显，有目共睹，无需说明和论证。
evident ：指根据事实成为显然的。
clear ：普通用词，侧重清楚明白。
plain ：普通用词，含义与clear很接近，可通用，但plain着重简单明了，不复杂。
distinct ：较正式用词，指轮廓的清楚或定义、含义的明确，不会弄错。
definite ：语气肯定，着重明白无误，无可怀疑。
manifest ：语义较强，书面用词，强调一目了然，暗示不要任何推论就一清二楚。

sentence.Network_en: The threat of inflation is already evident in bond prices.
sentence.Network_cn: 通货膨胀的危险在证券价格上已经表现得很明显。

sentence.Network_en: The privations of monastery life were evident in his appearance.
sentence.Network_cn: 从他的外表来看可以明显看出修道院生活的清贫。

sentence.Network_en: The immense difficulties facing European businessmen in Russia were only too evident.
sentence.Network_cn: 在俄罗斯的欧洲商人所面临的巨大困难是显而易见的。

间接证据 (circumstantial evidence) 的主要难题是，如果间接证据有任何表明清白的可能性，控方负有举证责任排除这种可能性。这对 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, or from Latin evidens, evident- 'obvious to the eye or mind', from e- (variant of ex-) 'out' + videre 'to see'

entry.def: If something is evident, you notice it easily and clearly.

example.ex: His footprints were clearly evident in the heavy dust...
example.tran: 厚厚的尘土中他的脚印清晰易见。

example.ex: The threat of inflation is already evident in bond prices.
example.tran: 通货膨胀的危险在证券价格上已经表现得很明显。

entry.def: You use evident to show that you are certain about a situation or fact and your interpretation of it.

example.ex: It was evident that she had once been a beauty...
The cities are bombarded day after day in an evident effort to force their surrender.
example.tran: 那些城市遭到日复一日的炮轰，目的显然是要逼他们投降。

means.word_mean: 1. clearly apparent or obvious to the mind or senses;

sentences.sentence: "the effects of the drought are apparent to anyone who sees the parched fields"
"it is plain that he is no reactionary"

means.word_mean: 2. capable of being seen or noticed;

sentences.sentence: "a clearly evident erasure in the manuscript"

auth_sentence.content: Changes are now evident in the Drapers' marriage.
auth_sentence.res_content: Changes are now evident in the Drapers' marriage.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Changes are now evident in the Drapers' marriage.

auth_sentence.content: The magnitude of the disaster is evident to all.
auth_sentence.res_content: The magnitude of the disaster is evident to all.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The magnitude of the disaster is evident to all.

auth_sentence.content: Please don't deny what's all too evident!
auth_sentence.res_content: Please don't deny what's all too evident!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Please don't deny what's all too evident!

stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+divide[v.分开]+ual……的→不能分开的→个人的,单独的
e出+vid看,查+ent……的→看出来了→明显的
im不+provident[adj.顾及未来的,有远见的]→adj.不顾将来的,不节俭的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 惹人反感的,招人嫉妒的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+vid看,查+ious……的→看上去不好的→有害的
pro向前+vid看+ent……的→向前看的→有远见的
provide预备,提供+ed→在……前提之下→倘若

stems_affixes.value_cn: 红利,股息;回报,效益;被除数,划分
stems_affixes.word_buile: divide[v.分开]+end→划分,区分[红利,股息也是划分出去的]
in不+divide[v.分开]+ual……的→不能分开的→个人的,单独的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 明显;显著;根据;证据;迹象
stems_affixes.word_buile: e出+vid看,查+ence表名词→看出来了→明显
pro向前+vid看+ency表名词→向前看→有远见

stems_affixes.value_cn: 电视, 录象, 视频
stems_affixes.word_buile: vid看,查+eo→n.电视, 录象, 视频

stems_affixes.value_cn: 供应,供给,准备,预防,规定
stems_affixes.word_buile: pro前,提前+vid看,查+e→提前看好→预备,提供

Sentence.sentence: The profound connection between identity and communication is dramatically evident in children who are deprived of human contact.

sentences.en: He signed his name with evident satisfaction.
sentences.cn: 他显然很满意地签了名。

sentences.en: This fact is too evident to require proof.
sentences.cn: 这事实很明显, 用不着证明。

sentences.en: It is evident that smoking is harmful to health.
sentences.cn: 很明显, 抽烟对健康有害。

sentences.en: It's evident to me that they have no experience in this work.
sentences.cn: 在我看来, 他们干这项工作没有经验是显而易见的。

sentences.en: The spokesman made it evident that no compromise was yet in sight.
sentences.cn: 发言人表示, 目前还不会妥协。

jushi.english: He signed his name with evident satisfaction.
jushi.chinese: 他显然很满意地签了名。

jushi.english: This is most strikingly evident in the field of economics.
jushi.chinese: 这在经济领域里是极其明显的。
